about_the_game:
This set contains one Valentine's Day costume each for all 34 characters in DOA5LR.

Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
All characters in DOA5LR

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.

*The Fireworks stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game.

Akira, Sarah, Pai, and Jacky characters ©SEGA. Virtua Fighter is either a registered trademark or trademark of SEGA Corporation.
©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.
detailed_description:
NOTICE

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

This set contains one Valentine's Day costume each for all 34 characters in DOA5LR. Note: The costume damage feature is not available on the Steam system version. This set contains costumes for the following characters: All characters in DOA5LR *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. *The Fireworks stage shown in the screenshots cannot be used in this version of the game. Akira, Sarah, Pai, and Jacky characters ©SEGA. Virtua Fighter is either a registered trademark or trademark of SEGA Corporation. ©2015 Valve Corporation. Steam and the Steam logo are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Valve Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries.

name: Valentine's Day Set

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over

oflc.descriptors: Violence, sexualised imagery and nudity, online interactivity

pegi.descriptors: Violence, sexual and online gameplay with other people.
